title: Track Awesome Playwright Updates Weekly
_seo_title: Track Awesome Playwright (mxschmitt/awesome-playwright) Updates Weekly - Track Awesome List
description: A curated list of awesome tools, utils and projects using Playwright

items.title: Awesome Playwright Updates on Mar 17 - Mar 23, 2025
items.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Mar 17 - Mar 23, 2025
items.content_text:
### Integrations

*   [Playwright Angular Schematic (⭐15)](https://github.com/playwright-community/playwright-ng-schematics) - Adds Playwright Test to your Angular project.

### Utils

*   [@bgotink/playwright-coverage (⭐44)](https://github.com/bgotink/playwright-coverage) - Report coverage on playwright tests using v8 coverage, without requiring any instrumentation.
items.content_html:
Integrations

  • Playwright Angular Schematic (⭐15) - Adds Playwright Test to your Angular project.

Utils

  • @bgotink/playwright-coverage (⭐44) - Report coverage on playwright tests using v8 coverage, without requiring any instrumentation.

items.title: Awesome Playwright Updates on Feb 12 - Feb 18, 2024
items.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Feb 12 - Feb 18, 2024
items.content_text:
### Utils

*   [POMWright (⭐42)](https://github.com/DyHex/POMWright) - POMWright is a TypeScript-based framework designed for creating and maintaining Page Object Models. It streamlines locator management by automatically generating nested/chained locators from flat and atomic locator structures which can be dynamically updated throughout tests. This significantly reduces code duplication and makes tests easier to read, write, and maintain.
items.content_html:
Utils

  • POMWright (⭐42) - POMWright is a TypeScript-based framework designed for creating and maintaining Page Object Models. It streamlines locator management by automatically generating nested/chained locators from flat and atomic locator structures which can be dynamically updated throughout tests. This significantly reduces code duplication and makes tests easier to read, write, and maintain.

items.title: Awesome Playwright Updates on Jan 08 - Jan 14, 2024
items.summary: 3 awesome projects updated on Jan 08 - Jan 14, 2024
items.content_text:
### Integrations

*   [@guidepup/playwright (⭐68)](https://github.com/guidepup/guidepup-playwright) - VoiceOver and NVDA screen reader driver integration for Playwright.

### Utils

*   [playwright-elements](https://danteukraine.github.io/playwright-elements) - Playwright test extension for creatation of reusable components with ability to add child elements, methods and call them in chain. Reduce amount of your code in page object, or even use elements without page object.

### Reporters

*   [qase (⭐53)](https://github.com/qase-tms/qase-javascript/tree/master/qase-playwright) - Playwright Qase Reporter, send test executions to [qase](https://qase.io/).
items.content_html:
Integrations

  • @guidepup/playwright (⭐68) - VoiceOver and NVDA screen reader driver integration for Playwright.

Utils

  • playwright-elements - Playwright test extension for creatation of reusable components with ability to add child elements, methods and call them in chain. Reduce amount of your code in page object, or even use elements without page object.

Reporters

  • qase (⭐53) - Playwright Qase Reporter, send test executions to qase.

items.title: Awesome Playwright Updates on Dec 18 - Dec 24, 2023
items.summary: 3 awesome projects updated on Dec 18 - Dec 24, 2023
items.content_text:
### Integrations

*   [Serenity/JS](https://serenity-js.org) - Acceptance testing, reporting, and test integration framework for Playwright, implementing the [Screenplay Pattern](https://serenity-js.org/handbook/design/screenplay-pattern/).

### Utils

*   [automated-Playwright-UI-tests](https://github.com/OctoMind-dev) - Auto-generated, run & maintained with AI-assisted test case discovery.

### Guides

*   [serenity-js.org](https://serenity-js.org/handbook/web-testing/your-first-web-scenario/) - Learn how to write acceptance tests in business language using Playwright and the Serenity/JS Screenplay Pattern.
items.content_html:
Integrations

  • Serenity/JS - Acceptance testing, reporting, and test integration framework for Playwright, implementing the Screenplay Pattern.

Utils

  • automated-Playwright-UI-tests - Auto-generated, run & maintained with AI-assisted test case discovery.

Guides

  • serenity-js.org - Learn how to write acceptance tests in business language using Playwright and the Serenity/JS Screenplay Pattern.

items.title: Awesome Playwright Updates on Dec 11 - Dec 17, 2023
items.summary: 7 awesome projects updated on Dec 11 - Dec 17, 2023
items.content_text:
### Integrations

*   [Chromium for Serverless platforms (⭐1.3k)](https://github.com/Sparticuz/chromium?tab=readme-ov-file#usage-with-playwright) - Chromium for Serverless platforms.
*   [@axe-core/playwright (⭐662)](https://github.com/dequelabs/axe-core-npm/blob/develop/packages/playwright/README.md) - Official Axe integration with Playwright.
*   [axe-playwright (⭐213)](https://github.com/abhinaba-ghosh/axe-playwright) - Inofficial integration of Axe with Playwright.
*   [artillery-engine-playwright (⭐8.5k)](https://github.com/artilleryio/artillery/tree/main/packages/artillery-engine-playwright) - Load testing with Playwright.

### Utils

*   [TestingBot](https://testingbot.com) - Connect your Playwright tests with browsers in the Cloud.

### Reporters

*   [testomatio-reporter (⭐139)](https://github.com/testomatio/reporter) - Runs and sends test executions to the TCMS testomatio, Jira / Linear / Azure DevOps task management.

### Guides

*   [theheadless.dev](https://www.checklyhq.com/learn/headless/) - Practical guides and runnable examples on Playwright (and Puppeteer).
items.content_html:
Integrations

  • Chromium for Serverless platforms (⭐1.3k) - Chromium for Serverless platforms.
  • @axe-core/playwright (⭐662) - Official Axe integration with Playwright.
  • axe-playwright (⭐213) - Inofficial integration of Axe with Playwright.
  • artillery-engine-playwright (⭐8.5k) - Load testing with Playwright.

Utils

  • TestingBot - Connect your Playwright tests with browsers in the Cloud.

Reporters

  • testomatio-reporter (⭐139) - Runs and sends test executions to the TCMS testomatio, Jira / Linear / Azure DevOps task management.

Guides

  • theheadless.dev - Practical guides and runnable examples on Playwright (and Puppeteer).

items.title: Awesome Playwright Updates on Apr 13 - Apr 19, 2020
items.summary: 7 awesome projects updated on Apr 13 - Apr 19, 2020
items.content_text:
### Integrations

*   [jest-playwright (⭐540)](https://github.com/playwright-community/jest-playwright/) - Jest adapter for running Playwright.

### Showcases

*   [playwright-jest-examples (⭐106)](https://github.com/playwright-community/playwright-jest-examples) - Examples of the Jest Playwright tools in combination to test popular sites.
*   [VS Code (⭐174k)](https://github.com/microsoft/vscode) - Playwright is used to run cross-browser tests on their web builds.
*   [TypeScript (⭐105k)](https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript) - Playwright is used test typescript.js across browsers.
*   [Elastic APM JS agent (⭐286)](https://github.com/elastic/apm-agent-rum-js) - Playwright is used to run benchmark tests across browsers.
*   [Blockstack (⭐321)](https://github.com/blockstack/ux) - Playwright is used to run cross-browser UI tests.
*   [xterm.js (⭐19k)](https://github.com/xtermjs/xterm.js) - Playwright is used to run cross-browser integration tests.
items.content_html:
Integrations

  • jest-playwright (⭐540) - Jest adapter for running Playwright.

Showcases

  • playwright-jest-examples (⭐106) - Examples of the Jest Playwright tools in combination to test popular sites.
  • VS Code (⭐174k) - Playwright is used to run cross-browser tests on their web builds.
  • TypeScript (⭐105k) - Playwright is used test typescript.js across browsers.
  • Elastic APM JS agent (⭐286) - Playwright is used to run benchmark tests across browsers.
  • Blockstack (⭐321) - Playwright is used to run cross-browser UI tests.
  • xterm.js (⭐19k) - Playwright is used to run cross-browser integration tests.
